steps.name:
okapiRequest ("{ method: 'POST',
  path: 'finance/ledgers',
  body: 
   { id: '82002f99-d516-4b67-9caf-27ba58a816e5',
     name: 'E2E ledger 728.8778896551455850',
     code: 'E2ELC163.11627414954978850',
     description: 'E2E ledger description 343.5432634514304850',
     ledgerStatus: 'Frozen',
     currency: 'USD',
     restrictEncumbrance: false,
     restrictExpenditures: false,
     acqUnitIds: [ '0ebb1f7d-983f-3026-8a4c-5318e0ebc041' ],
     fiscalYearOneId: 'a06a95ef-5a96-4839-a2d9-ac484a25c261' } }")

createLedgerApi ("{ id: '82002f99-d516-4b67-9caf-27ba58a816e5',
  name: 'E2E ledger 728.8778896551455850',
  code: 'E2ELC163.11627414954978850',
  description: 'E2E ledger description 343.5432634514304850',
  ledgerStatus: 'Frozen',
  currency: 'USD',
  restrictEncumbrance: false,
  restrictExpenditures: false,
  acqUnitIds: [ '0ebb1f7d-983f-3026-8a4c-5318e0ebc041' ],
  fiscalYearOneId: 'a06a95ef-5a96-4839-a2d9-ac484a25c261' }")
